## Load packages
```{r}
#| code-fold: true
library(here)
library(readr)
library(lubridate)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Clean data
```{r}
# Source cleaning function
source(here("scripts", "functions", "clean_longterm.R"))

# Apply cleaning function
clean_longterm()
```

## Read data
```{r}
longterm <- read_csv(here("data", "processed", "MARINe_data", "longterm", "longterm_processed.csv"))
```
